Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.31119600] No hemolytic activity against bovine blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.31119600] The cell viability of Vero ATCC CCL 1-81 cells induced by NBC2253 is 87.8%, 66.4%, 62.2%, 69.1% and 68.8% at peptide concentrations of 1.2, 3.7, 11.1, 33.3 and 100 μM.
Sequence Information.N-terminal Modification: The sulfhydryl side chain of the cysteine residue was conjugated to AuNC(previously modified with SPDP) via a disulfide bond.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-nagetive bacteria.

Literature.Title: New Synthetic Peptides Conjugated to Gold Nanoclusters Antibiotic Activity Against Escherichia coli O157H7 and Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA).
Literature.Author: Prada YA, Guzmán F, Ortíz C, Cabanzo R, Torres R, Mejía-Ospino E
